About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon-Fri 8am-5pm or by appointment; closed weekends and public holidays. Reference assistance available in person. No copying services available but photocopier can be used at 10c per page.

About.Access: Minimum age 18 years. Written approval for access provided within 14 days of application. One week's advance notice of visit required. Access to records not normally available for research can be granted following written application to the Manager Information Services.

About.Acquisition focus: Any material relating to the history and development of health care in Western Australia.

About.Major holdings: Health Department of Western Australia: Miscellaneous Publications 1886- (3.5m); Photographs, Manuscripts 1886- (1m).

Contact.Street address: Information Services, Ground Floor `B' Block, 189 Royal Street, East Perth 6004
